## Overview
At the current time (19-03-2024) HydroFlows has the following components/ software needed to develop this package.

These four components are:

- git
    - [setup guide](git.qmd)
- python environment (conda/ mamba)
    - [setup guide](python.qmd)
- pre-commit
    - [small setup](git.qmd#pre-commit-setup)
- quarto documentation framework
    - [setup guide](quarto.qmd)
